about.title: About Us
about.mission: At Broner Books, we believe that great stories know no borders. Our mission is to craft editions in one or two languages, across a growing range of languages for families around the world, fostering understanding and appreciation across cultures.
about.story: Broner Books is a small, founder-led studio shaped by family life and a love of language. It began as a parent's project to make reading across languages feel natural and joyful. We create each title with care, blending storytelling, design, and modern creative workflows, then refine it through an editorial lens so every book feels intentional, warm, and welcoming.
